t: These sheets are so soft you’ll never want to get out of bed—and they’re shockingly affordable
s: April 11, 2021 - ... Nestwell is an affordably decadent collection of sheets, duvets, and pillows made with every kind of sleeper in mind: that includes restless sleepers, hot sleepers, cold sleepers, side sleepers — even Goldilocks herself would happily get her zzzs in these next-level linens.

t: Bed Bath & Beyond’s new collection gives luxury brands a run for their money
s: June 4, 2021 - Nestwell is a new in-house line of products from Bed Bath & Beyond that launched in March 2021. The collection includes both bedding and bath products, and in its PR announcement, the brand claims Nestwell products are designed to help “create oasis spaces in your home.”

t: Bed Bath & Beyond Launches Private-Label Brand, Nestwell
s: March 23, 2021 - Bed Bath & Beyond launched the first of eight new private-label brands, marking the latest move by a national retail chain to sell its own branded products. The brand, Nestwell, offers a line of sheets, blankets, pillows, mattress toppers, duvets, bath rugs and bath towels.
